"Xitrae": "Hey, thanks for showing up. Lemme introduce myself once more."
"My name is Xitrae. I'm with Central City's Supply Corps. We handle supplies and resources that support our daily lives as well as our daily battles."
"So, moving to the issue at hand..."
"To thank ARKS for all their hard work, the Supply Corps has been working with Logistics to throw a party."
"As a surprise, we had made a bunch of these peculiar little white round treats called Tsukimi Dango."
"But, get this... While we were having them transported by truck, some of them went missing."
"As a member of the Transportation Division, this is absolutely humiliating!"
"After everyone put so much effort into making them! Oh, as soon as I find out where, when, and WHO has them, I'll...!"
"... Ahem. Let's just say that's a bit of the anger that's been running around in my head."
"... And, while I'd love to look for the culprit myself, I've got my hands full with setting up the rest of the party."
"And so I was like, hey, it'd be really cool if I could get you to help me out with this... and stuff."
"I've contacted a few of the people who were at the scene, so could I ask you to hear what they have to say?"
"I fully intend to thank you properly."
"Alright, thanks again!"
"<%me>! Thanks for showing up."
"So, moving right to the issue at hand..."
"Welcome back! How did it go? Find anything out?"
"When I find out who's responsible, I PROMISE you they'll wish they had NEVER--"
"... Okay, stay cool, Xitrae. Stay cool..."
"Deep breaths... In and out..."
"Alright. Can you try to sum up what they said for me?"
"I see... A small, round... \"something\"... with hands."
"Huh? What could that be...?"
"Can you make any sense of that description?"
"Oh yeah! Doesn't get much more \"round\" than those guys!"
"But, Gororons aren't exactly small, are they?"
"Oh! Those portly little critters! A Tames, huh... I never thought of that."
"But... Could a Sunny really do something like that...?"
"Ah, those fellas who never miss a work-out day? They DO always carry around those boulders..."
"But, Za Oodan Loas aren't exactly round, are they?"
"Hmmm... It's probably something else..."
"Oh, I know! Let's just use the Dango to lure out the culprit! <%me>, will you give me a hand?"
"... Round, small, and has hands..."
"I see. So that's what they meant..."
"Quick, try chasing that Tsukimi Rappy!"
"Welcome back. Sorry for all the trouble."
"... Really though, who would've thought the culprit was a Rappy?"
"If it was a DOLL, I would have absolutely no mercy, but... Well, Rappies will be Rappies, I guess."
"If word gets out that we got bamboozled by one of THOSE, oh, my boss would just cry..."
"I'm just gonna... write this all up as an unfortunate run-in with an enemy raid."
"... They say that Tsukimi Dango share a likeness with how our moon, Gaeira, shines in the sky around this time of year."
"Apparently, if you eat only as many as the number of years you've lived, something good will happen to you."
"That's why I wanted to make sure we had more than enough for all the ARKS to eat."
"But... since those are gone, we'll just have to make that much more this year."
"Gonna be a huge pain in the butt to resupply all those materials..."
"Anyways, if it interests you, you should try eating some yourself."
"Welp, I guess that problem's settled."
"Settled? Is it really settled, though? ... Ah, let's just say it is."
"I'm just gonna move on to the next job."
"Anyways, thanks so much for your help. I hope I can count on you again sometime in the future."
"See you around!"
"In battle, supplies are like a lifeline!"
"We can't let some teensy little enemy raid get the best of us!"
"Maybe a Gororon...?"
"What about a Sunny?"
"Za Oodan Loa could've done it..."
